attributes.action: Make "Zeitgeist Moving Forward" part of the British Secondary School Curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
Include this short three hour video into our education system. This is so that the youth of our country can make an informed decision as to how they can contribute to our planet.
 Showing the facts of what is going on in the world, thus revealing how we need radical change if our society is to achieve sustainability and social equality.

rejection.details: In order to publish your e-petition we require more detailed information regarding the video you refer to or if possible provide a link to the video if it is available. Many thanks.
